doctors.name: David Schidlow
doctors.title: Board Certified Pediatric Cardiologist
desc: Expert in fetal echocardiography and other non-invasive cardiac imaging such as trans-thoracic and trans-esophageal echocardiography, and cardiac MRI
Works with families in Fetal Heart Program, guiding them through prenatal diagnosis, delivery, and post-natal care of children with congenital heart disease
